explains: v. 改组；重组（困难企业的债务）（restructure 的现在分词）
wordGroup: economic restructuring n. 经济转型，经济结构调整；经济改组
debt restructuring 债务重订，债务调整
restructuring plan n. 重组计划
political restructuring 政治体制改革
restructuring of enterprise 企业改制

sentences.en: They're restructuring and slimming down the workforce.
sentences.cn: 他们正对职工加以重组和裁减。

sentences.en: The restructuring of the pattern of consumption also lagged behind.
sentences.cn: 消费结构的调整也落后了。

sentences.en: The company is to lay off 1,520 workers as part of a restructuring.
sentences.cn: 作为改组的一部分，这家公司将解雇1520名工人。
